result.eng: The work will be delayed by a week.
result.ga: beidh moill seachtaine ar an obair
result.orig: Beidh moill seachtaine ar an obair
result.html: beidh moill seachtaine ar an obairThe work will be delayed by a week.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ moill seaċtaine ar an obairThe work will be delayed by a week.

result.eng: Letters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ga: bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.orig: Bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.html: bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ponchtml: bíonn moill ar litreaċa gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.

result.eng: The traffic delayed me.
result.ga: chuir an trácht moill orm
result.orig: Chuir an trácht moill orm
result.html: chuir an trácht moill ormThe traffic delayed me.
result.ponchtml: ċuir an tráċt moill ormThe traffic delayed me.

result.eng: He was delayed even further.
result.ga: cuireadh mhoill bhreise air
result.orig: Cuireadh mhoill bhreise air
result.html: cuireadh mhoill bhreise airHe was delayed even further.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ ṁoill ḃreise airHe was delayed even further.

result.eng: Train services in Dublin were delayed.
result.ga: cuireadh moill ar sheirbhísí traenach i mbaile Átha cliath
result.orig: Cuireadh moill ar sheirbhísí traenach i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.html: cuireadh moill ar sheirbhísí traenach i mbaile Átha cliathTrain services in Dublin were delayed.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ moill ar ẛeirḃísí traenaċ i mbaile Áṫa cliaṫTrain services in Dublin were delayed.

result.eng: I was delayed in the airport by three days.
result.ga: cuireadh moill trí lá orm san aerfort
result.orig: Cuireadh moill trí lá orm san aerfort
result.html: cuireadh moill trí lá orm san aerfortI was delayed in the airport by three days.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ moill trí lá orm san aerfortI was delayed in the airport by three days.

result.eng: We'll do it without further delay.
result.ga: déanfaidh muid é gan a thuilleadh moille
result.orig: Déanfaidh muid é gan a thuilleadh moille
result.html: déanfaidh muid é gan a thuilleadh moilleWe'll do it without further delay.
result.ponchtml: déanfaiḋ muid é gan a ṫuilleaḋ moilleWe'll do it without further delay.

result.eng: As usual, the bus is late.
result.ga: mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.orig: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.html: mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhusAs usual, the bus is late.
result.ponchtml: mar is gnáċ tá moill ar an ḃusAs usual, the bus is late.

result.eng: We will come without any delay.
result.ga: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bith
result.orig: Tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bith
result.html: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bithWe will come without any delay.
result.ponchtml: tiocfaiḋ muid gan moill ar biṫWe will come without any delay.

result.eng: The buses are running late again.
result.ga: tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.orig: Tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.html: tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.
result.ponchtml: tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.

result.eng: I'm running late a little.
result.ga: tá moill bheag orm
result.orig: Tá moill bheag orm
result.html: tá moill bheag ormI'm running late a little.
result.ponchtml: tá moill ḃeag ormI'm running late a little.

result.eng: It is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ga: tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.orig: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.html: tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.

result.eng: A report is to be published without delay.
result.ga: tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan mhoill
result.orig: Tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan mhoill
result.html: tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan mhoillA report is to be published without delay.
result.ponchtml: tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan ṁoillA report is to be published without delay.

result.eng: I only live five minutes from the college, but still I am very late.
result.ga: níl an teach ach cúig nóiméad ón ollscoil ach fós bíonn an-mhoill orm

result.eng: We were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ga: bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.orig: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus

result.eng: It burns slowly.
result.ga: dónn sé go mall

result.html: dónn sé go mallIt burns slowly.

result.eng: They passed each other at a slow, even pace.
